website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance Fresh Foam 1165 managed to please consumers in search of a comfortable pair of walking shoes.
pros: A vast majority of owners raved about how comfortable the New Balance Fresh Foam 1165 was
The arch of the foot felt very supported in this trainer, according to numerous reviewers
Several testers appreciated the lightweight and breathable materials used on the upper
Some people liked that the insole can be swapped with custom orthotics
cons: Some fitness walking enthusiasts ranted that the footgear lacked stability and lateral support

customer_reviews.title: Great walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and tried on and I am so happy. These are super comfortable and have great support. I purchased them for walking as I was having trouble with my heels and I also have bad knees. These seem life a perfect fit for me. Plenty of room in the toe box and my heels are cushioned just right. I did size up.........I normally use to wear a size 7, but I ordered a size 8 and it is a perfect fit. Still can wiggle my toes , but have great support.........not 'stiff' at all.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have changed my walking workouts
customer_reviews.text: I walk at least 2 miles a day on sidewalks. For years I’ve been doing that in running shoes. The difference once I started wearing these New Balance walking shoes instead is remarkable. I’m more comfortable, I don’t get pain in my back or Achilles when I walk longer distances. Plus, I love the colours.
customer_reviews.author: Jukisoo

customer_reviews.title: These are great, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great, comfortable shoes. I have large and arthritic feet. These shoes arrived I put them on and wore them all day comfortably. I haven’t been able to say that about more than six shoes in my life and I am inky mid- seventies. Actually I am about to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Nursing school. We have to wear all white for clinical. I suffer from plantar fasciitis and need something with really good support. I wear these all day long and the still feel feel really good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes right out of the box. Did lots of walking over the weekend on a trip, walked for exercise when I first got them. Love the color - they are even better looking than the pic showed.
customer_reviews.author: V. Moberg

customer_reviews.title: Should not have sized up!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, they are light and comfortable. However, I made the mistake of sizing up a half size because the reviews said they were too small, and now am having to pay to return them because they are too large. I reordered my usual size and am hopeful they will be just right. Unfortunately, I have to have Amazon mail them to a friend because I won’t be home to receive them on time for my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: HDG-H

customer_reviews.title: Flat feet fix for me !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet,and these are very comfortable. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my trip to Italy. We hiked, and we climbed a few thousand steps. These shoes were perfect and very comfortable during our activity in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, feels like I’m walking on a cloud. Probably they best shoes I’ve ever had. And I’ve never had new balance before and my feet are small and wide these shoes are perfect for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Josey Coston

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: What I liked best is that they are very comfortable, I use one orthotic and it fits nicely. Extremely comfortable for walking. One comment stated laces were cheap. They are the flat kind which I find stay tied better, but they do squish everything down and stretch so it looks like they are tied with string. That’s why only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, as advertised. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable right out of the box. I have trouble finding sneakers that are comfortable and was very hesitant about ordering online. I had another pair of New Balance, leather, that lasted forever and was comfortable, so I chanced ordering this pair. Couldn’t be happier. The tread looks decent. My only concern is the mesh like top. I am afraid the toe will wear out too soon. I hope not because I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Schow

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious walking
customer_reviews.text: I walk 4 miles every day and only ever wear New Balance walking shoes. I have purchased many different New Balance walking styles over the years and these are by far the worst shoe I've ever had. While they are the usual New Balance fit and quality they are definitely not meant for more than the most casual walking. Shoe feels like walking on air around the house but a totally different story when doing any serious walking. I'm lucky to make it a half mile before my feet hurt. I will be sending these to the thrift store after only wearing half a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: KH avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet...Happy walk
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on walking shoes these sounded the best, and boy were they right. I never knew there was a difference in running and walking shoes, but as soon as I put these on I could feel the difference in the cushioning in the heel. Walking is so much better with these on my feet. They are so comfortable all the way around. I had to play with the shoe string placement a couple times to get the perfect fit, so I highly recommend doing that if you feel they are rubbing on your ankles. Great investment for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Deana I

customer_reviews.title: The wide was perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been all over town in stores looking for comfortable walking shoes ... and couldn't find anything to accommodate my wide foot. So I took a shot in the dark and ordered a pair online. I can hardly believe that I hit the jackpot with this shoe! Size 9.5 is what I normally wear and this was a perfect fit in the Wide. I found the support under the heel very solid. The top is mesh is pretty thin which is nice for ventilation (my feet always get hot), although I wonder how quickly my big toe will wear out that mesh from wear, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JessM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not as good as older models
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes right out of the box, maybe just a tiny bit narrow. These are not as comfortable as older models of New Balance Fresh Foam walking shoes that I have purchased, but they are still good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LDF

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought New Balance and these shoes did not disappoint. They are very comfortable and have nice thick soles. They look good too. I was afraid they might be too clunky looking. I love the material they use on these shoes. Seem to have good air flow. I was going to buy another pair but they went up on the price by about $8.00.😐. Maybe they will have a sale.😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized very small, had to order two sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quality tennis shoes. I ordered an 8.5 W (D for wide) was comfortable. Love the weight, under 8 ounces. However, my big toes hit right up to the end of the shoes. First, I ordered a size 8 regular (I’m a 7.5 in tennis, the sport, sneakers) too small. Then, I ordered the next size up. I am now ordering a 9 D. Both of my feet are healing and I want to get out and exercise by taking my walks again. Heard great reviews about NB. I will update my review once I receive the next size shoes. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and looking
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on to check fitting no problem at all fit was very comfortable. Because of weather yet to wear it outside. Plan is spray (ordered white) to keep looking good. Then after our snowy weather ends will be ready to give it a good test/
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: I so much wanted to like these shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs (probably 4) of New Balance shoes, all the same size, and most all great for me. (Shoes are such a subjective thing) I have found that the first 2-3 pair were great! The last pair I have had for a few years and they are still way too stiff. I was hoping these would, once again, be just what I hoped for. But they weren't. Same size as always, but the toe box was much too wide, and the heel slipped. The length was fine. However, just because they weren't right for me doesn't mean they won't fit you...especially if you have a wide- medium foot. I wear a 7M.
customer_reviews.author: Susabella

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the $80 price. Pretty flimsy sides.
customer_reviews.text: A bit wider than I'd expected, even for a wide shoe. I always order wide in new balance so that surprises me. The shoe sides seem not sturdy at all and made of poor material. Definitely not worth the $80 price. I expected more out of a higher priced New Balance show but I guess I'll just stick to the more affordable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A Wee Bit Cramped with the Insert
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like these shoes very much. But I ordered my regular size, 8W and the my foot went right to the toe. I know 8.5 would be way too large for me as I have a short foot. I took out the inserts and they fit just fine. I hope when they stretch out I'll be able to use the inserts as I think they would add some nice cushion. These are good shoes, just beware of the cramped sizing.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Martz

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have flate feet, and often flared-up plantar fasciitis problem. It is not easy to find shoes that would meet all my special needs. This pair of Fresh Foam Walking shoes arrived last week, and I have been wearing them inside my house. I found them very comfortable, no need to break in, have just right toe space, and great padding for the heels. The shoes also have fairly good arch support, but could have been built stronger though. Wearing with my own inserts may help add more arch support. I will try that next week.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Wore it right off the box after putting a thin insert. Roomy toe box and good support. I will wear this for my trip to Egypt. Time will tell how this will hold up after the trip. I will provide update.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Deteriorated in <4 months of wearing
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shoe and at first it was perfect, great fit, very comfortable, and perfect support! I’m an avid walker and in less than 4 months the inside lining at the back heel has worn through and the support deteriorated. Looking for a different pair already. Super disappointed in New Balance on this one; would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: happycat99

customer_reviews.title: Not typical NB athletic shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is light weight and the breathable mesh is great! I was disappointed in the size. I have ordered countless pairs of NB athletic shoes and have never felt that they were uncomfortable. I have cutom orthotics so the removable footbed is necessary. These did not fit as nicely as NB I have purchased in the past. It feels like the footbed is not as deep as other pairs I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie S

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dogs 4 - 5 miles a day, and these shoes are quite comfortable. It's nice to find a wide width in a smaller shoe size. The only reason I didn't give the shoes 5 stars was because I tend to have an issue with the ball of one foot, and it would be nice to have a little more padding in the ball. However, the heel is very well padded and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: dancing dog

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortablest!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered more than a dozen shoes to try and this one beat them all. I have heel spurs and this style hits right where it need to. Good arch support. White looks so. Much better than the gray. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: kwt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these came in a size 10.5 extra wide because that is just right for my wide feet. The upper part is stretchy enough over the bunion on one foot that it doesn't hurt. I also like that the insole is removable so that I could put my orthotic inserts in for arch support. The purple color makes me smile.
customer_reviews.author: Nanazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Daily Walks
customer_reviews.text: My sister purchased me my first pair of New Balance about 10 years ago, so I already knew this was the brand I was going with when it was finally time to buy another pair. I'm over 50, so I needed a really good comfortable, support shoe for walking. New Balance gets a 5-star from me!
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: support
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the fit, the color and the breathing capability. Runs a little short for support. Gets dirty easily and hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable toe box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in 9W and because of the way the tongue is attached on the inside I couldn’t get my foot with a brace I wear in the shoe. I then ordered the 9.5W and it goes on. Very comfortable and I like the wide toe box. Nicely padded.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but no support
customer_reviews.text: Being returned. Has removable insole to accommodate orthotics. But not enough side support.
customer_reviews.author: Lady senior shopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Picked these because they were recommended by a walking shoe article, and am very pleased with the purchase. Plenty of toe room. Really like the way this helps rock your foot gently from heel to toe. I add after market insoles, but I do that for all my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T2

customer_reviews.title: Yup they are top of list.,
customer_reviews.text: I research best walking shoes and these were on top three of different lists for walking. They did not disappoint I walk eight miles a day.so far these have performed very well in all category's . Only thing I would say is order a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Anne alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This pair of 1165 New Balance walking shoes is one of my all time favorite shoes. I could not find the size 11 M that I usually wear, so ordered the 10 1/2 W and they fit wonderfully. I am excited to have a new pair. I have knee issues and also some arthritis in my back and I can wear these when shopping and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Readerbg

customer_reviews.title: excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: i have fascia plantar and i survive Disney for 4 days with my shoes NO PAIN
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought one size too long, and 1 size too wide, and it fit perfectly. I love the style. My feet feel so comfortable when I wear them. Every time I am going on a long walk I make sure I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: LikeToCrochet

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have nerve problems in my extremities but I need to walk everyday in order to remain ambulatory. I’ve tried all kinds of sneakers. Nike’s, Adidas, other New Balance, Brooks and a load of others. You name it, cheap to super expensive I have probably tried it. This model shoe works the best for me of all the many shoes I’ve tried. I can walk nearly pain free. I really like theses shoes but I should mention the sizing. They run short and a bit wide.
customer_reviews.author: J. Catherine Donelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe very much, bit the inside construction that attaches the tongue to an inner lining made it too difficult for me to get my foot in with the orthotic I wear. I am returning this size and ordered a half size up. I can get the larger one on but it feels a little big. The fit of the 9 was probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, fit is great
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing this shoe and glad I did. Most said to buy a half size larger and that is what I did, the fit is perfect. Very comfortable and looks good. So would say buy 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recently did testing on my legs. They would hurt a lot after walking. The diagnosis was the pain was muscular and normal for my age. I usually get cross trainers but couldn't find any in my size. I decided to look into walking shoes.The foam walking shoe is perfect for long walks and my legs don't hurt anymore. I would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Nora M

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I have always ordered my walking/running shoes wide width. These were very sloppy and I couldn't lace them tight enough to be comfortable. I will say I have never purchased this model of NB shoe before so that may be the difference. The 1080 is a good fit for me. I thought I would try another shoe that was $50 cheaper, unfortunately it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I have falling arches..
customer_reviews.text: I have falling arches and my podiatrist recommended that I buy New balance. I have always liked New balance shoe's so I searched and searched until I came across this shoe. I promise you will not want to take them off! Fits great feels good and looks wonderful on my feet. These shoes are not cheap but you are getting your monies worth and then some. BTW New balance shoe's are very durable and will wear a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and no break in period needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes and then immediately wore them for a week of walking all around Toronto on vacation. My feet get blisters really easily, but these shoes were very comfortable despite walking miles in them with no break in period and I got no blisters. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: T. George

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in normal athletic shoe size and found the shoe runs a half size too small in length. Returned and reordered in 8 vs 7.5, otherwise nice looking shoe, will review new shoe after wearing with updated info.
customer_reviews.author: jct in Olywa

customer_reviews.title: Ordering shoes just to return them is a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Two different shoes, now I’m stuck having to go to Kohl’s to return. I’ve requested a label to be sent to my house because I don’t have a printer. This is a real pain in the gas tank and my time. So much for connivence.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Hard to please feet are finally happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice width to these sneakers and very comfortable. I have trouble finding shoes that feel comfortable with my bunions, high arches, and wide feet. These fit perfectly and I can wear them all day! The top is soft material so it doesn’t bother my bunion. I am going to see if they are available in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Mens shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in a size based on them being "Mens", of course they are NOT men's shoes, they are womens. I expected this since they are highlighted in pink. Of course with all the multiple genders out there you never know. The extra wide is good, just a bit short. Will try again
customer_reviews.author: Douglas MacFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable......
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely uncomfortable-Typically New Balance are the best fitting shoes for me, but these were a real disappointment. Not giving up on New Balance - Just returning and trying a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Rbay

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: A bit narrower than the original 1165. Width was critical after my wive's ankle fusion, but 6 months post surgery the fit is perfect since swelling has gone down. Would recommend post ankle TTC nail surgery if your swelling has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight for that Price.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but very light weight, not much arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Bibi Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great support.
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and wide feet and I walk a lot. I love these sneakers....comfortable with excellent support. This is my 2nd pair.....I wore the others out!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I started walking during China virus. My heels were hurting w old shoes so got these. Heel pain gone but I still feel like a 90 yr old in a 54 yr old body. None the less, they are great. Won’t buy white ever again tho they get dirty easy
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Feet in heaven
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers for my mother who was getting insoles. One shoe was slightly bigger than the other but it was perfect because it was the foot that hurts her the most. She loves them! She says she walks around everywhere and her feet don’t ache. So happy with this purchase! Will buy them if them have them in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance shoes. Unfortunately, this style was too small (narrow) compared to others in the same size.
customer_reviews.author: JulieP

customer_reviews.title: does not fit the same as my other NB shoes bought previous month
customer_reviews.text: Felt cheap. I did put them up after trying them on and did not wear them. It didn't matter what socks I wore, they were too big. I am disapointed that I now have to sell them myself somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: I usually order Fresh Foam running shoes but tried these instead. Found them comfortable and with good support. Alos, they didn't look like grandmother shoes as I feared.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Light waking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The arch support could be better. Over all they do the job for walking. They are very light, its like walking with no sneakers on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is great, but was a little small.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoe. Very comfortable, but my toe was hitting the front, so I needed at least a 1/2 size larger. The return was easy and paid.
customer_reviews.author: DAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfy sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say they are New Balance . They arrived earlier than expected . Packaged perfectly. Price was a bit higher than what I’ve paid in the past , but needed size and wanted color. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LinSue729

customer_reviews.title: Great walkers
customer_reviews.text: I have thin feet, no arches , knee and I t band problems, usually when I go over 3 miles my foot hurts really bad, I have 0 foot pain with these
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost no padding
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, fit properly for size. Decent toe box room. I am returning them because there is almost no inner sole padding. They feel like an old pair of shoes, when it's time to start thinking about getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little short
customer_reviews.text: Runs a liitle short, but it's a very light and airy shoe. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light and easy to wear all day long - feet feel great at the end of that day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made shoes, attractive look
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, shoes sturdy and well made. Only reason for not giving 5 stars, not well padded. If you have inserts they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE F TUSKEY

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance and it's the only brand I wear. The shoes are perfect right out of the box. I walk every day and replace my sneakers every 6 months or so. I wouldn't even consider wearing anything but New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE BARANOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My wife writes this review: These extra wide sneakers are so comfortable ! I usually buy wide sneakers and they are never a good fit. I love this sneaker !!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Leclerc

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very comfortable and wide for my old nurse feet! Happy!
customer_reviews.author: bojo

customer_reviews.title: Great For Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: I got the wide fit and it's a great fit. Comfortable and sturdy. Great support. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my feet and these are very comfortable. Unfortunately they are very expensive so I can only buy them when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: CRF222

customer_reviews.title: Give feet a new attitude
customer_reviews.text: I love NB shoes so I'm biased. They're comfortable easy to slip my feet into. Makes my feet happy on errand runs and clean up days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for knee pain victims.
customer_reviews.text: I have knee pain. Need lots of support for this. 2nd pair of Fresh Foam. Different styles. Just seem to wear out extremely fast (No Cushion/support) These are definitely better than the other style I had... just not for knee pain! My feet are wide, plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with them
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes...I love new balance regardless I always wear them but I had a fracture and I was healed after 6 months ...I knew I had riverside new shoes so I looked around at new balance and found these...I said it's perfect...gave them a try to see if they would help near-term fracture healed and I am so happy...will never ever go back to a different brand love new balance. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Elvia Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. Very supportive and comfortable. I have a high arch so it was nice to have something that supported that. I also have long toes and had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a half size larger than my normal New Balance size. Width was fine. Otherwise, these are great. Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: AkCacheCow

customer_reviews.title: mesh was nice for summer though
customer_reviews.text: Not as co.fortable as thought they looked...mesh was nice for summer though...just didn't feel right on these diabetic feet. Returned them. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Himes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like how bottom heel flares out.
customer_reviews.text: The heel bottom flares out a bit and made me stumble a couple of times from one hitting the other. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: The shoes did not fit well. Even though I've owned several pair of New Balance shoes, these did not fit. The right was too tight while the left was fine. Needed to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kindschy

customer_reviews.title: Usual size is too small
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing New Balance shoes for years. this particular pair seems to run small. I would reorder a 10 instead of a 9.5 but there are shipping costs for the return so not playing with this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: blastmaker

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: the wide is not only wide but larger in everyway. Too big for me
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The fit is awesome and the support is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. My arthritic feet don't hurt after working out which was my #1 goal in finding shoes. Feels like walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Castellano

customer_reviews.title: The fit and balance.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting pair of shoes I’ve worn in years. I am planning to buy another pair and recommend them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: passionate

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes to walk on cobblestones in Quebec. As a senior, was very pleased and have recommended New Balance shoes to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! I can take longer walks with these ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I can take longer walks with these on than any other walking shoe I have tried! Perfect fit for my small but wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very good width
customer_reviews.text: Have bunions and high instep. Sneaker fit great and soft sides did not rub on my bunion. Very light weight which make it easy to walk
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have difficulty with shoes fitting comfortably with high instep and C-D width. These are light weight fits so well. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Bills

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are “what the doctor ordered.” They are wide, stable and lightweight. My feet are comfortable in them even after 12 hour days. They provide support, and let your feet breathe. I am alternating between 2 pair and plan to get a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great all around sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and style. It was light weight and I could put my orthotics in but the sneakers ended up being a little too tight so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes. I work long hours on the feet standing and these work great. Today is my 1st day wearing them and I can already tell my feet will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!
customer_reviews.text: They look more stylish in real life. Great support and pretty comfortable for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Madsmom

customer_reviews.title: I’m on my feet at work all day and these shoes have been so great. They are extremely comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet and it’s hard to find shoes that fit. I’m on my feet at work all day and these shoes have been so great. They are extremely comfortable and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSoldier

customer_reviews.title: Good fit so far.....
customer_reviews.text: This show was recommended by my Orthopedic since I have had to have surgery to repair my foot and leg. I am hoping that next week I will be able to start wearing them on my repaired foot. The other shoe does fit and feels very supportive. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best walking shoe I have ever put on my feet. As soon as I slid my feet in the shoe I knew I was hooked. So very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Custer

customer_reviews.title: My Second pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these in March and they were so comfortable for walking. Most shoes are not that comfortable. In fact, sometimes, I think I should just wear the boxes😀
customer_reviews.author: Diane Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes for wide feet. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cedes

customer_reviews.title: Best product!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort, support and the lightness of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have a little corn-like thing on my little toe and it never bothers me when wearing these shoes. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoe fit well, felt really cushiony, and looked good, but it did not work for me. While the shoe has arch support, I have over-pronation and need more support than this shoe can offer. I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Phrynne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I developed plantar fasciitis in one of my feet, and these shoes help the pain immensely! I'm on my feet all day and these shoes are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Darby Pate

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance 847 for ten years. There size 75 are now to short and the size 8 is too large. My oldest shoes fit better than new ones. So I tried 1165, they fit perfectly!! My new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: tygrr

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Ww1165v1 Multisport Indoor Shoes
feature_bullets: Fresh Foam midsole cushioning is engineered for precision comfort
